content: this low sew bunny is inspired by jellycat s famous bashful bunny plushie now with just a hook and some yarn and a few notions you can have one of your very own this pattern is perfect for intermediate or advanced beginners sewing is minimal - the only sewing is to connect the head to the body you will need super bulky yarn a size j hook fiberfill and 14mm safety eyes to complete this easter time cutie a 25mm safety nose is also optional
